gen:link.msg:message: TV5: dim:IW doesn't follow "^ISIN/[A-Z0-9]{{12}}$" or "^CUSIP/.*" or "^SEDOL/.*" or "^WKN/.*" or "^BT/.*" or "^BBGID/.*" or "^RIC/.*" or "^FIGI/.*" or "^OCANNA/.*" or "^CAU/INST/.*" or "^CAU/MAL$" or "^CAU/INDEX/.*" or "^CAU/ISIN/.*" pattern -->Template 1: (All); Expression: dim:IW like "^ISIN/[A-Z0-9]{{12}}" or "^CUSIP/.*" or "^SEDOL/.*" or "^WKN/.*" or "^BT/.*" or "^BBGID/.*" or "^RIC/.*" or "^FIGI/.*" or "^OCANNA/.*" or "^CAU/INST/.*" or "^CAU/MAL$" or "^CAU/INDEX/.*" or "^CAU/ISIN/.*"
